home.brief: Hi, my name is Santiago, I'm Frontend Developer with Full-Stack knowledge.

about.title: About me
about.firstParagraph: I'm passionate about everything related to technology and innovation. I've worked using agile methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban in different work environments.
about.secondParagraph: I'm currently learning about technologies such as tRPC, NextJS. Also I'm taking a course of UX / UI Design.
